name: Das Duell der Piraten
overview: A German language text adventure based on the Steve Jackson\Ian Livingstone "gamebook" pirate book. That book had already been converted to a game in 1985 called Seas of Blood, but this is based on entirely different code, which, in turn, also had a re-release in 2022 with bugfixes and NTSC fixes in English in 2022. Play them all, it is a fun story!
